name: Puzzle Bebop
description:
“The unique control mechanic, the lovely retro aesthetic, and the lavish, pixellated visual effects that fill the screen during combo eliminations, and the like, make Puzzle Bebop a game well worth a look.” - Blake Patterson of TouchArcade

Puzzle Bebop is a fun and exciting falling block puzzle game powered by TouchCircus, making it the most intuitive play control yet for a touch based puzzle game. Simply draw big circles with your finger to rotate the falling pieces and swipe right, left, or down to move them. Group together 4 or more pieces of the same color to clear them out. Have fun and good luck!

Features:
- Awesome 8-bit graphics and retro audio
- Intuitive Play Control by TouchCircus - draw circles to rotate
- Game Center Leaderboards and Achievements
- 2 game modes with 3 difficulty settings
